creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
markings: censor seal: 極 {kiwame}; publisher's seal: 西宮 {Nishinomiya}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
signed: 五渡亭國貞画 {Gototei Kunisada ga}
text: Center sheet of a triptych. Related to the play Date moyô gedatsu no Kinugawa 伊達模様解脱絹川, performed at the Nakamura Theater, 1821, third month.
title: Actor Segawa Kikunojō V as Ashikaga Yorikane
